Package glueweb.controllers

Class Summary
ApplyController is the action when you push Apply button
BrowseDirectoryController is the action when you push browse button and select a directory using SWT
BrowseOCLController is the action when you push browse button and select a file using SWT
BrowseXMIController is the action when you push browse button and select a file using SWT
ClearController is the action to erase all content in a text field
ComboController complete correctly the technology combo field based on viewpoint combo selected
GlueController When GlueButton is pushed, this class validates all text fields and shows an error when some of them are null or the file which represent does not exits
pathModifyController show in status label an error when path is not correct
RadioButtonController enable or disable Local or URL because are opposite
SaveAsController save the log file
urlModifyController show in status label an error when URL is not correct
